org.intellimate.izou.sdk.util

Interface ResourceUser

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ContextProvider, org.intellimate.izou.identification.Identifiable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    PresenceHelper, PresenceProvider, PresenceResourceProvider, PresenceResourceUser
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PresenceConstant, PresenceNonConstant

    public interface ResourceUser
extends ContextProvider, org.intellimate.izou.identification.Identifiable
    provides various utility-methods to receive Resources
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Leander Kurscheidt

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default Optional<CompletableFuture<List<org.intellimate.izou.resource.ResourceModel>>> generateResource(String resourceID)
      generates the specified resource from the first matching ResourceBuilder (use the ID if you want to be sure).

    • Method Detail

      • generateResource

        default Optional<CompletableFuture<List<org.intellimate.izou.resource.ResourceModel>>> generateResource(String resourceID)
        generates the specified resource from the first matching ResourceBuilder (use the ID if you want to be sure). tip: for a better coding experience: use the method 
        
 .orElse(CompletableFuture.completedFuture(new LinkedList<>()))
        to handle the empty case.
        Parameters:
        resourceID - the id of the resource
        Returns:
        an Optional containing a future of a list of results

      • generateResource

        default Optional<CompletableFuture<List<org.intellimate.izou.resource.ResourceModel>>> generateResource(String resourceID,
                                                                                                        org.intellimate.izou.identification.Identification provider)
        generates the specified resource from the specified ResourceBuilder. tip: for a better coding experience: use the method 
        
 .orElse(CompletableFuture.completedFuture(new LinkedList<>()))
        to handle the empty case.
        Parameters:
        resourceID - the id of the resource
        provider - the specified provider
        Returns:
        an Optional containing a future of a list of results
